page.topic: Xbasic Code Editors - JSON Strings - Real-time Validation
page.description: If you use the specify <<%json%... %json% delimiters to enter a long string of JSON data, the Xbasic editor will perform real-time validation on the JSON data.

section.description: For example, in the image below, the JSON has an error because of the trailing comma after the last property (age: 23). Notice the squiggly red line indicating the error. If you click on the error indicator you will see the error message.
